feed.title: easypaysy - A layer-two protocol to send payments without addresses

entry.title: easypaysy - A layer-two protocol to send payments without addresses
entry.summary: There is a brief conversation between Tim Blokdijk and José Femenías regarding the decentralization of an unknown system. Tim asked if the system was fully decentralized to which José confirmed that it was indeed fully decentralized. This means that every user is responsible for creating and maintaining their own account. No further information about the system or its purpose was provided.
